info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 6 at 8:56PM CDT until April 13 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Paducah KY
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois...Missouri...
Mississippi River at Thebes affecting Alexander and Scott Counties.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Kentucky...Illinois...
Mississippi River at New Madrid affecting Fulton, Mississippi and New Madrid Counties.
Mississippi River at Cape Girardeau affecting Cape Girardeau, Scott, Union, Alexander, Jackson and Perry Counties.
Mississippi River near Hickman affecting Fulton County.
.Heavy rainfall has ended across the region. The Mississippi River is already above flood stage in some locations and others will rise above through tonight. Crests on the Mississippi River will occur in the next 7 to 10 days.
For the Mississippi River...including Cape Girardeau, Thebes, Hickman, New Madrid...Major flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Mississippi River at Thebes.
* WHEN...Until Sunday, April 13.
* IMPACTS...At 34.0 feet, The town of Thebes begins to flood.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 32.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 35.0 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet.
info.instruction:
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY, APRIL 13
